name: Balland
description:
1vs1 game (Player vs Player) to play this game you have to play with someone in same PC or mobile. you have to hit other ball to drop down from the map In the game some powers to help to get over your enemy. How to Play: Player1: wasd Player2: arrows keys Powers: 1- Box Power: increase your hit 2- Thunder Power: Increase you speed Credit Jan_hunter: Game Developer Andy: Game Tester (Thanks) 3D Model: Box Model:

https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/boxing-gloves-left-handed-076293541203455da59a38eea5b6a44b

Music: ecrett:

https://ecrettmusic.com

Aiva:

https://www.aiva.ai/

Note: This game is under development and it's not finished game and i like to hear your feedback about the game and i want to improve my game. In the future will add maps and some news power but also i want to hear your suggestions. Thanks :)
